## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G09970](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G09970)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CYP78A7</u>
- **Gene Name:** cytochrome P450, family 78, subfamily A, polypeptide 7
- **Description:**   cytochrome P450, family 78, subfamily A, polypeptide 7;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)

## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0000017](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0000017)&nbsp;---&nbsp;vascular leaf primordium&nbsp;---&nbsp;leaf primordium (exact), portion of vascular leaf primordium tissue (exact), primordio de hoja (Spanish, exact), vascular leaf primordia (exact, plural), 葉原基 (Japanese, exact)
   - [PO:0006344](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0006344)&nbsp;---&nbsp;shoot lateral meristem&nbsp;---&nbsp;meristema lateral del epiblasto (epiblastema) (Spanish, exact), shoot lateral growth meristem (exact), 茎側分裂組織 (Japanese, exact)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [amp1 lamp1 cyp78a5,7 ]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Super-bushy dwarf plants with a massively increased leaf number. Sterile.
   - [cyp78a5/cyp78a7 ]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Similar to  amp1-13. Extra cotyledons, precocious leaf formation, and oversized shoot meristem area.Suspensor becomes shoot like.
## Function-related keywords:
   - [vascular leaf primordium](/tags/vascular-leaf-primordium/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[shoot lateral meristem](/tags/shoot-lateral-meristem/)
